attributes.title: Seriously, head my warning.
attributes.review: I don’t really leave reviews, particularly negative reviews, but this app is horrifying. I was thinking it was rated 17+ for voting, but it was actually incredibly graphic. It was very glitchy and I was SIM-swapped almost immediately after downloading. That basically means all my information was stolen by hackers who used the app to get into my phone, and I was locked out of my phone. Seriously, stay away!

attributes.title: Malware
attributes.review: I had to get a new phone. After the app installed Siri started reading the script of the bee movie. There was no way to silence the device. My phone did this repeatedly and the battery never died despite being on 10% at the time of the download. I threw it out my window, into the bath, into the trash, fire pit, 100,000,000 ft cliff and it always found its way back. My whole family is cursed now. The phone follows me to this day. Help me.

attributes.title: Warning!!! I got 1,000 viruses!!!!
attributes.review: As soon as I saw that my lord and savior Donald Trump had an app I knew I needed it. Not only did it take 10+ hours to download as soon as I opened it I got a message from none other than the CHINESE GOVERNMENT!!! It told me that they had all of my information and were going to use it to hack the election and let stinky Biden win!!! Warning!!! Please if you call yourself a trump supporter don’t download this!!!! It will only lead to his downfall!!!

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: I downloaded this app really wanting updates on my amazing president, but the app was so slow and so old- telling of his age i suppose. The app asked for my location and sent me menacing notifications throughout the day. It constantly crashed and gave no information whatsoever regarding relevant politics. The app is riddled with bugs and is honestly useless. It also took money from me without asking or verifying. DO NOT DOWNLOAD. Sad😔

attributes.title: TRUMP 2020
attributes.review: The fact that everyone downloaded the app just to leave hate comments is EXTREMELY petty. Do you all seriously have nothing better to do? You all just HAVE to find a way to hate on Trump. So disappointing. 😒🇺🇸 TRUMP TRAIN BABY!

attributes.title: very not good app
attributes.review: I’m a proud American, but this app is just the absolute worst. Horrible color scheme choices. The blue on the app is not the same color as the blue on our proud country’s flag. I am disgusted. The app is slow, lack luster, and frankly so incredibly terrible. Deleted right away. Biggest waste of my time as a PROUD American. Cannot stand the horrendous navigation of this application. I can only pray that this very sadly unfortunate  app will get better with time 😥😥😥 please help!!!

attributes.title: Trump 2020
attributes.review: The whiny little crybabies at tik tok who want to burn our constitution and give up all of their rights have no life. They are so consumed with hatred that they have nothing better to do than rate this app low. Tik tok tards need to grow up. Trump and Pence 2020!!!! Save freedom and save America, Vote Trump!

attributes.title: i DONT recommend 🤬
attributes.review: i hate this app so much ! it took up most of my phone storage so quickly without even using the app yet .. which was VERY strange . i am very upset because my right when i downloading this app ( which took hours to download 🙄 ) , my phone instantly became glitchy and i had to get a new phone 😠 . i am very upset and i think this app should get taken down before this happens to anyone else . 🤬

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: I download is this app thinking it was a fun game about our US President. To find out it’s not made me cry a little😢. The audacity our President has to trick me into downloading this app is astronomical. I am fairly disappointed in this app the fact that everywhere it says “Trump 2020” is not fair this is not a good app and I think it should not be available to young children. Now my child is crying because my child had me download this app as game.

attributes.title: WORST APP: CRASHES AND GLITCHES
attributes.review: This is the worst app on the app store. It took a whole day to download and when it did download it kept crashing. Now it crashes 9/10 times I open it. Be warned it gave my phone a virus and deleted all the data off it. So sad I can not used this to support the campaign🤧. When it doesn't crash it is slow and lags to the point I am unable to click anything. Unbelievable. I am frankly appalled.
